---
title: "U.S. Greenhouse Gas Center: Data Usage Notebooks"
---

Welcome to the [U.S. Greenhouse Gas (GHG) Center](https://earth.gov/ghgcenter) data usage notebooks, your gateway to exploring and analyzing curated datasets on greenhouse gas emissions.
Our cloud-based system offers seamless access to GHG curated datasets. Dive into the data with our data usage Jupyter notebooks, which demonstrate how to explore, access, visualize, and conduct basic data analysis for each GHG Center dataset in a code notebook environment. The data usage notebooks are grouped topically. The dataset product type (model output, satellite observation, etc.) is noted next to the notebook name. Click on a notebook to learn more about the dataset and to view the data usage code.

Join us in our mission to make data-driven environmental solutions.
Explore, analyze, and make a difference with the US GHG Center.

[View the US GHG Center Data Catalog](https://earth.gov/ghgcenter/data-catalog)

## Gridded Anthropogenic Greenhouse Gas Emissions
1. OCO-2 MIP Top-Down CO₂ Budgets - Model Output
   - [Beginner Level](user_data_notebooks/oco2-mip-co2budget-yeargrid-v1_User_Notebook.ipynb)- Access the collection using the GHGC API `/stac` endpoint and visualize the dataset using raster API `/stac/tilejson.json `endpoint and `folium`.
   - [Intermediate Level](user_data_notebooks/oco2-mip-National-co2budget.ipynb)- Read national CO₂ budget and investigate uncertainties and metrics for understanding the dataset. 
2. ODIAC Fossil Fuel CO₂ Emissions - Model Output
   - [Beginner Level](user_data_notebooks/odiac-ffco2-monthgrid-v2022_User_Notebook.ipynb)
3. TM5-4DVar Isotopic CH₄ Inverse Fluxes - Model Output, Ground Measurements
   - [Beginner Level](user_data_notebooks/tm54dvar-ch4flux-monthgrid-v1_User_Notebook.ipynb)
4. U.S. Gridded Anthropogenic Methane Emissions Inventory - Gridded Inventory
   - [Beginner Level](user_data_notebooks/epa-ch4emission-grid-v2express_User_Notebook.ipynb)
